message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/Pattern 

OntologyDesignPatterns.org is a Semantic Web portal dedicated to ontology design patterns (OPs):
http://ontologydesignpatterns.org/wiki/Main_Page
Peter Clark, John Thompson, Bruce Porter. Knowledge patterns (2000) In Proc. of KR-2000
http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/summary?doi=10.1.1.11.9400
the first paper about knowledge pattern
Xi Deng, Volker Haarslev, Nematollaah Shiri. Measuring inconsistencies in ontologies (2007)In ESWC (2007) 326–340
http://www.eswc2007.org/pdf/eswc07-deng.pdf
Aldo Gangemi. Design patterns for legal ontology constructions In 2nd Workshop on Legal Ontologies and Artificial Intelligence Techniques, pp. 65-85
http://ftp.informatik.rwth-aachen.de/Publications/CEUR-WS/Vol-321/paper4.pdf
Gangemi A., Presutti V. (in press). Ontology Design Patterns. In S. Staab, R. Studer (Ed.),  Handbook of Ontologies (2nd edition). Springer: Berlin.
Gangemi A. (2007). Design Patterns for Legal On-tology Construction. In P. Casanovas, P. Noriega, D. Bourcier, F. Galindo (Ed.),  Trends in Legal Know-ledge: The Semantic Web and the Regulation of Elec-tronic Social Systems European Press Academic Pub-lishing.
Gangemi, A. (2005). Ontology Design Patterns for Semantic Web Content. In M. Musen et al. (eds.): Pro-ceedings of the Fourth International Semantic Web Conference Berlin, Springer.
Joey Lam, Jeff Z. Pan, Derek Sleeman, Wamberto Vasconcelos. A Fine-Grained Approach to Resolving Unsatisfiable Ontologies
Journal of Data Semantics (JoDS). : pages 62-95
http://www.abdn.ac.uk/~csc280/LPSV06.pdf
http://www.csd.abdn.ac.uk/publications/listpersonal.php?username=jpan
Yue Ma, Pascal Hitzler, and Zuoquan Lin. Approaches to inconsistency handling in description-logic based. In Proc. of WI'06, 2006. 13.
http://www.aifb.uni-karlsruhe.de/WBS/gqi/papers/swws07.pdf
Presutti V., Gangemi A. (2008). Content Ontology Design Patterns as practical building blocks for web ontologies. In Proceedings of ER2008 Barcelona, Spain.
this article is part of the D2.5.1 Neon Deliverable. it describe two CP: information realization and Time indexed person role pattern and how to reuse them in another ontology.
Presutti V. & al.Neon Deliverable D2.5.1: A Library of Ontology De-sign Patterns <
http://www.neon-project.org
>
Joerg Rech, Raimund L. Feldmann, Eric Ras;  "Knowledge Patterns". In M. E. Jennex (Ed.), Encyclopedia of Knowledge Management (2nd Edition), IGI Global, USA, 2009.
Joerg Rech, Bjoern Decker, Eric Ras, Andreas Jedlitschka, Raimund L. Feldmann;  "The Quality of Knowledge: Knowledge Patterns Knowledge Refactorings". International Journal of Knowledge Management, Vol. 3, No. 3, p. 74-103, 2007.
Hai Wang, Alan Rector, Nick Drummond, Matthew Horridge, et al. OWL Pizzas: Practical Experience of Teaching OWL-DL: Common Errors & Common Patterns. EKAW 2004
http://www.co-ode.org/resources/papers/ekaw2004.pdf
explain the most important errors made by newscomers in DL
.
other paper of Alan Rector for the COODE project
http://www.co-ode.org/resources/papers/
lots about debugging, normalizing and so one...
Semantic Web Best Practices and Deployment Working Group
http://www.w3.org/2001/sw/BestPractices/
Collection of antipattern in Laboratory for Applied Ontology
http://wiki.loa-cnr.it/index.php/LoaWiki:MixedDomains
they are 4 Logical anti-pattern I do not understand one of them.
